msbt.message: I wonder if they're gonna build another house here Too much development, if you ask me! In other words, get off my lawn!
Don't mind me—I'm just keepin' the lonelier parts of the island safe for everyone.
Heh. You caught me.Sometimes I like to wander off to these more remote parts of the island for some breathin' room.
Empty places like this are good for thinkin' without any distractions Don'tcha agree, ?
Hrmm Everythin' seems to check out just fine here. Good, good
I like to think of this whole space around here as my backyard.Now don't worry—that doesn't mean you're trespassin'. Yet. Gahaha!
Hey, you ever been over to visit the old place?It's not for me to say, but I'm sure glad I don't live there. To each their own, .
<20_2 arg="10" />Stuck with your tent, huh? <20_3 arg="6" />Nothin' wrong with tent livin', butno plans for a house? Well, if you're happy where you are, that's all that matters, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Well, it's a starter home, but it's not too bad, is it?<20_2 arg="6" />Just blow out this wall and that wall over there and you'll be in business, kiddo. Gahaha!
<20_2 arg="10" />Whoa, look at the size of your place!<20_3 arg="6" />I'm seethin' with envy. You got room for twice my collection, !
Hey, I heard you added on to the placea whole 'nother room!Just think of the possibilities Hold on, maybe I should be lookin' into somethin' like this, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Well, look who's livin' large!<20_3 arg="6" />Guess you earned this. Can't build a house this big without lots of hard work, .
<20_2 arg="10" />Your place is so roomy! What do you even do with all that space?<20_3 arg="6" />Even without a second story, you've got yourself a straight-up castle here, !
Hey, I got a question for you, ya two-story-house titanIs there any downside to havin' a place this big? Like, are you spendin' three hours a day dustin'?

I hear tell that you've added on a whole 'nother level here.I gotta say, I always wanted a basement. Even when I was a youngster, . I tried buildin' one by diggin' out the space under our old house.<10_4 /> It didn't go over as well as I hoped.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, I guess old is still livin' in a tent, huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Nothin' wrong with that. Feels like you're at one with nature!Maybe I'll tear down my own place and put up a tent Heh, guess I don't have to go THAT far!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You know you can't judge a house just by its size, don'tcha?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You also judge it by how clean the bathroom is, ! Gahaha!

<20_2 arg="10" />Hmm, looks like is out on <20_2 arg="9" />official business or somethin'. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Or at least their place seems quiet. I ain't gonna break in or nothin' to be sure, though, .

<20_2 arg="10" />Seen 's place? <20_2 arg="9" />I heard it's got two rooms. Wonder what they're for<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Reckon I'd use one to hide all the stuff I don't want visitors to see!<10_4 /> Like my dirty dishes, !

<20_2 arg="10" />If I lived in 's house, <20_2 arg="9" />I reckon I'd be satisfied.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But that doesn't mean they need to stop there. Maybe they want an even bigger place, !

<20_2 arg="10" />Just get a load of the size of <20_2 arg="9" />'s house!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ah, but who am I to judge if someone wants a big ol' home? More power to , I say. Maybe my house is too SMALL! I gotta get to work, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Yep, this big ol' two-story mansion here <20_2 arg="9" />belongs to none other than . I wonder what the view is like from way up on top
Guess who went and built a new basement?<10_4 /> !I do love basements, . They're like secret lairs!I wonder how is outfittin' their lair

Rentin' one corner of a tent for a shop might make it seem modest, but Timmy's place comes in handy. When you're in a pinch and just need somethin' small, or when you've got stuff to sell, the place is a big help!
If you ask me, Nook's Cranny's what a REAL store is like. It's got good hours, it's well stocked And Timmy never complains no matter how many times I ask him what something costs. Gahaha!
I just can't believe how roomy Nook's Cranny is. Ain't it somethin', !Plus, seein' such a mighty store being run by those two kiddos all by themselves? Warms the heart.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, didja hear we're finally gettin' ourselves a museum?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The thing about new museums, thoughis that you gotta fill 'em up with stuff, ! I'm sure Blathers would appreciate any old thing you can donate to the cause, kiddo.

Heya, kiddo. Got some business at the Resident Services, do you?One of the things I like so much about livin' here is the accessibility of resources like this. I can come on down and grumble at the establishment in my jammies if I like! Gahaha!

Whatcha doin' at the airport? Goin' somewhere, ?Me, I like to travel, but I hate flyin' on them airplanes.And it's not just the cramped seats, or the bad food, or the stressful lines either. No, waitit IS all those things!
This plaza sure sees a lot of use. Only makes sense, I guess. It is right smack in the heart of things.
These pavin' stones sure class up the plaza, . Nice!

<20_2 arg="10" />Not big on shoppin' for clothes, <20_2 arg="9" />but I do like comin' here to the tailors.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Mabel and Sable always manage to sweet-talk me into buyin' myself new duds, somehow.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Looks like someone's movin' here, huh, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Whaddaya reckon they'll be like? I ain't big on change, .
Maybe this'd surprise you, but I've always been a big fan of museums, especially the natural-history kind.Used to beg my folks to take me so I could gawk at all them dusty ol' dinosaur bones,
So, the other day I was lookin' at somethin', and I had what I like to call a " Thought." When do fish sleep? And where? Do they have tiny beds?Where do you reckon that little rests?

So, the other day I was at the museum, and I saw a little And it got me thinkin'. When I was a youngster, I would've picked one of those things up with my hand. But now that I'm a grown man, I reckon I'd scream if one landed on me. Go figure, .
Hey, you know that fossil in the museum? You know the one I mean. The ! Can you imagine somethin' like that walkin' around in real life? Prehistoric times, kiddo. Wild.
